subject: Hockey, Ice
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The former N.H.L. star Scott Niedermayer captained the Canadian team that beat the United States for the gold medal in the 2010 Winter Olympics and won four Stanley Cups.
snippet: The former N.H.L. star Scott Niedermayer captained the Canadian team that beat the United States for the gold medal in the 2010 Winter Olympics and won four Stanley Cups.
